data.name: Across the Galaxy: Infinite War
data.detailed_description:
This is an endless interstellar war. You are sent to the battlefield by the mysterious organization to test the combat capability of the latest experimental spacecraft, and help collect as much battlefield information about the major factions as possible. How long you can last depends on your reasonable allocation of weapons and equipment and excellent flight operations

The game includes "endless war"mode and "boss rush"mode

No matter which game mode, it will contain enemy forces from 7 factions, a total of 99 conventional types of enemies and 21 boss enemies

There will be 25 kinds of player spaceships, 16 main weapons of different styles, 15 sub weapons, 12 special weapons, 6 ultimate weapons and 21 combat devices to choose from. You can match them at will to combine the weapons and ships that are most suitable for your style

Different spaceships will have different numbers of cabins and passive skill combinations. You can further personalize the collocation of your own spaceships, whether it is defense oriented, full-scale attack or rapid collision

*Endless war mode will provide you with an endless STG game experience of fighting the enemy, and will show you your real-time and final scores, constantly surpassing yourself and breaking the highest score
